titleStmt.title: The felicity of Queen Elizabeth: and her times, with other things; by the Right Honorable Francis Ld Bacon Viscount St Alban.
In felicem memoriam Elizabethae. English
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

titleStmt.title: The felicity of Queen Elizabeth: and her times, with other things; by the Right Honorable Francis Ld Bacon Viscount St Alban.
In felicem memoriam Elizabethae. English
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
Burghley, William Cecil, Baron, 1520-1598.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Newcomb, for George Latham at the Bishops Head in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: In felicem memoriam Elizabethae.
"The apology of Francis Bacon; in, certain imputations concerning the late Earl of Essex" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.

The apology of Francis Bacon; in, certain imputations concerning the late Earl of Essex -- The Bacon his letter to the most illustrious and most excellent Prince Charles, Prince of Wales, Duke of Corn-wal, Earl of Chester, &c -- The Lord Treasurer Burleigh his advice to Queen Elizabeth in matters of religion and state -- To the Ld. Bacon, then falling from favour -- To my reverend friend Doctor A -- In obitum incomparailis Fransci de Verulamio, &c.
